title: Anatoly Karatsuba
summary: Anatoly Alexeyevich Karatsuba (his first name often spelled Anatolii) (Russian: Анато́лий Алексе́евич Карацу́ба; Grozny, Soviet Union, 31 January 1937 – Moscow, Russia, 28 September 2008[1]) was a Russian mathematician working in the field of analytic number theory, p-adic numbers and Dirichlet series.
